title: How Tisha Thompson Addressed the Industry's 'Authenticity Gap' With LYS Beauty
description: Watch the full conversation between Tisha Thompson and Fashionista's Beauty & Style Director Steph Saltzman on The Fashionista Network. With more than 15 years of corporate experience as a beauty executive and expertise as a makeup artist, Tisha Thompson set out to address the authenticity gap ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
